TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler(object sender, SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs)
public delegate void SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的來源，即 控制項。

span.span: The source of the event, the control.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
